Columns

class tyr.lineage.columns.Core(source, name, on_null='PASS', is_event_time=False, is_primary_key=False, var_type: str | None = None, macro_group: str = '')
class tyr.lineage.columns.Select(source, alias: str | None = None, var_type: str | None = None, on_null: str | None = None, is_primary_key: bool = False, is_event_time: bool = False, macro_group: str = '')
class tyr.lineage.columns.WildCard(macro_group: str = '')

WildCard selects all columns from associated table. Use of this class breaks lineage. Only use where appropriate. Recommended alternative is lineage.macros.columns.select_all()
